GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.18 to before v5.4.200
GSD.description:
dm mirror log: round up region bitmap size to BITS_PER_LONG

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.200 by commit ae460312875159285cef5bf3dc654593f404a1ef, it was introduced in version v2.6.18 by commit 29121bd0b00ebb9524971a583fea4a2f7afe8041. For more details please see the references link.
